text: Dario Varga (born 2 April 1973) is a Croatian rowing coxswain. He competed in the men's coxed four event at the 1988 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Croatian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Yugoslavia Category:Rowers at the 1988 Summer Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Zadar
title: Dario Varga
